nodes.text: Brian was a man who lived on the planet of Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Brian worked as a messenger for Davin DeWitt, the Baron Administrator of the platform city of Bayonard. When DeWitt's daughter went missing, he wanted to send the heroes of Cularin to find her, so he sent Brian to collect them. Brian picked them up in an airspeeder and then flew them to Bayonard. He then escorted them to DeWitt's house and while they walked there, Brian pointed out the Bayonard Institute of Higher Education to the heroes.
